DOC.brief_title: Effects Proprioceptive Stimulation Under Visual Feedback Patient With CRPS
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate feasibility proprioceptive stimulation visual feedback treatment protocol ( use Gloreha® device ) compare usual physiotherapy treatment sub-acute stroke patient Complex regional pain syndrome . Treatments effect evaluate pain perception , upper extremity functionality change pain pressure treshold . Usual physiotherapy consist active passive mobilization , extensor digiti carpi functional electric stimulation , occupational therapy taping .
